channel.title: Add an enterprise IdP :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Add an enterprise IdP Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: What is an “Enterprise” IdP. We need to define it and understand whether this is the best way to split up IdPs. Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: - To make it more clear, change the dimensions to: - Azure AD to Azure AD IdP - Okta - to Okta -> Okta IdP - Generic OIDC IdP - Generic SAML 2.
